类型: Size: One SizeColor: Navyblue-87（with Inner Belt Version）
评论详情: I used this, along with a sparkly African headwrap ( also from Amazon),  to dress as “Black Panther’s” Queen Ramonda for a costume event.  The caftan was even more sparkly in person, and the hidden belt allows you to define a waistline inside the flowy outfit.  I’m only 5’1” and, as I’d expected, the gown was a little too long on me. However, tightening the belt kept the front from dragging the floor and wearing platform shoes minimized the drag of the back. I wore this on an extremely cold day and so wore a black undershirt underneath, which worked fine. The gown would be quite comfortable in summer, though, as it’s very lightweight.  The color was a vivid deep blue, just as pictured.
I would recommend this if you’re a big girl. It says one size but I’m average size 8-10 and it was extremely big on me. I had to have it altered.
